Email is one of the most important means of communication of our time. However, can the technology in terms of safety much to be desired. As an email user can neither be sure that no one is reading the news, nor that they arrive at the receiver also unchanged. To appropriate security measures - the so-called end-to-end encryption and digital signatures - each user must take care of yourself.
In this workshop you will learn openhpi also through practical exercises, such as encrypted with the use of free tools and send digitally signed emails and receive.
We invite you  here  (link to video tutorial) obtain information on all the contents of the workshop.
This course is part of the  Safer Internet Day  instead. This is a global initiative of the European Commission about Internet security, where we with  teachers online  cooperate. In  www.lehrer-online.de  teachers find teaching materials and current information about safe Internet use in schools and other educational contexts.
